Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon was born from passion that seeped into a coin. It wanders, apparently seeking to return to the treasure chest it once inhabited.
Generation IX.Violet: It wanders around, carrying an old coin on its back. It survives by draining the life-force from humans who try to pick up its coin.
